ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: That would be a shame.  Does anyone know the reasoning behind making Sr Apprentice robes No Trade/No Drop anyway.  It doesn t make sense to me.  Its a store
ygData.messageBody:
That would be a shame. Does anyone know the reasoning behind making Sr
Apprentice robes No Trade/No Drop anyway. It doesn't make sense to me. Its a
store bought item for crying out loud! Oh well, time to write another E-mail to
Verant. I really enjoy reading their canned responses.

Cheers
Malkin Fennin Ro

> I'm not sure this works anymore. I haven't tried giving the bag to
> someone, but the bank won't let me deposit a backpack with a spare SR
> Apprentice Robe in it.
